con:testCase.name: setAllHeaders
Clean up data - user and ES

con:testStep.name: Clean and reindex Full text - AUTHORIZATION_SUPERADMIN

con:request.name: Clean and reindex Full text - AUTHORIZATION_SUPERADMIN

con:testCase.name: Setup Configuration: InvType, BC and Seller, provider, user, role

con:request.name: Create Seller
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateSeller>\r <seller code="SELLER_FR" description="France Seller"> <currencyCode>EUR</currencyCode> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <parentSeller>MAIN_SELLER</parentSeller> <invoiceTypeSequences> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <entry> <key>${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_TEST-Type</key> <!--Optional:--> <value> <prefixEL>SellFact_</prefixEL> <sequenceSize>9</sequenceSize> <currentInvoiceNb>9</currentInvoiceNb> </value> </entry> </invoiceTypeSequences> </seller> </ws:createOrUpdateSeller>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testCase.name: Setup Catalog: Charges, Services, Offer, PP, Counters, Wallets

con:request.name: Create Product1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateProductTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <productTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRODUCT1" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRODUCT1 DESC"> <!--Optional:--> <name>${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRODUCT1 NAME</name> <!--Optional:--> <productChargeTemplates> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <productChargeTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PC1" description=""> <invoiceSubCategory></invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>FALSE</disabled> </productChargeTemplate> </productChargeTemplates> </productTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateProductTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Product2
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateProductTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <productTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRODUCT2" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRODUCT2 DESC"> <!--Optional:--> <name>${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRODUCT1 NAME</name> <!--Optional:--> <productChargeTemplates> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <productChargeTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PC2" description=""> <invoiceSubCategory></invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>FALSE</disabled> </productChargeTemplate> </productChargeTemplates> </productTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateProductTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create ScriptInstance
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.rating.RatingScript" description="rating script">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
            package org.meveo.service.script.rating;

import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.Map;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.WalletOperation;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class RatingScript extends Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RatingScript.class);

    public void execute(Map<String, Object> context) throws BusinessException {
        log.debug("Rating script creation script...");
        WalletOperation op = (WalletOperation) context.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY);
        op.setAmountWithoutTax(op.getAmountTax().add(BigDecimal.ONE));
    }
}
           ]]>
            </script>    
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:testCase.name: Setup Administration: Measurable Qtt,Charts, Notifications, etc..

con:request.name: create MeasurableQuantities
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateMeasurableQuantity>
<measurableQuantity code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_MQ1" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_MQ1-DESC">
<dimension1>1</dimension1>
<dimension2>2</dimension2>
<dimension3>3</dimension3>
<dimension4>4</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>true</additive>
<sqlQuery>select count(*) from billing_subscription where status='CREATED' and date(created)='#{date}'</sqlQuery>
<measurementPeriod>MONTHLY</measurementPeriod>
<lastMeasureDate>2016-03-16</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createOrUpdateMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create ScriptInstance
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script_Instance">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script;			
			import java.util.Map;
			import java.math.BigDecimal;
			import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
			import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
			import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
			import org.slf4j.Logger;
			import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;			
			public class ${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script extends Script {			  
			  	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script.class);
				public void execute(Map<String,Object> context) throws BusinessException{
					log.debug("${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script creation script...");
					log.debug("${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script creation script.");
				}
			}
		   ]]>
            </script>
            <executionRoles name="administrateur"></executionRoles>
            <sourcingRoles name="administrateur"></sourcingRoles>            
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create EmailNotifications
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateEmailNotification> <notification code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_EmailNotif1"> <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.crm.Customer</classNameFilter> <eventTypeFilter>CREATED</eventTypeFilter> <elFilter>#{event.code.startsWith('test')}</elFilter> <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script</scriptInstanceCode> <emailFrom>OpenCell</emailFrom> <emailToEl>#{context eq context}</emailToEl> <subject>Test Meveo Application</subject> <body>Test Body</body> <htmlBody>HTML Body</htmlBody> <counterTemplate>${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_CT1</counterTemplate> </notification> </ws:createOrUpdateEmailNotification> </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create Timer
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateTimer> <timerEntity code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Timer1" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Timer_DESCP" hour="1" minute="10" second="45" year="*" month="*" dayOfMonth="*" dayOfWeek="*"/> </ws:createOrUpdateTimer> </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
